VIII.iv.2.D.3.c
.
Absence of Evidence in Service Records of Presumptive Disabilities in FPOW Claims
Since the disabilities listed in
38 CFR 3.309(c)
are presumed to be SC a record of their treatment or existence during service is not required.
Do not deny SC for one of these conditions predicated solely upon a deficiency in the Veteran’s STRs.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D - Rating Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D
